entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT, Mont-Laurier
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:26 p.m. EDT Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness overnight. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Snow or rain. High 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning in the morning and ending in the afternoon then 40 percent chance of rain showers late in the afternoon. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind becoming south 20 km/h in the morning. High 7. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Sunday 2 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 1. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of rain showers or flurries in the evening. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light late in the evening. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Sunday 2 April 2023
